API Reference
======================

The API reference documentation is auto extracted from the source code and only
cover the public API exposed by the **pyqode.core** package.

For an easier browsing, the base classes of the framework have been separated
from the available modes and panels. A class diagram is also available so that
you can quickly get the big picture.

Parts of the public API reference
------------------------------------

.. hlist::
   :columns: 2

   * .. glossary::

      :doc:`api_core`
         The API documentation for the base classes of the framework.

   * .. glossary::

      :doc:`api_modes`
         The API documentation for the available modes

   * .. glossary::

      :doc:`api_panels`
         The API documentation for the available panels.

   * .. glossary::

      :doc:`api_class_diagram`
         pyQode class diagram
